attributes.action: The UK education system must improve to better support children.
attributes.additional_details: Over 1 million under-18s in England were in contact with NHS secondary mental health services in 2024-25 — more than double compared with 2020. I think this says more than anything.
attributes.background: I want the Government and Parliament to review the UK school education system. Many children, in primary and secondary schools, are not receiving enough support from teachers. Greater focus is needed on children’s learning, wellbeing, and especially their mental health

rejection.details: You could try and start a new petition setting out more clearly what they would like the review to consider.
